评论详情: This jacket is really nice, but, unfortunately, I had to return it. It was a gift to my sister. She has very, very large chest and it was too tight for her. If it was a medium, I would have kept it for myself. However, the large size was a proper large size, it's just that my sister has huge (natural) breast for her size.
I liked the jacket but I have a big chest so it was tighter than I like my jackets

This jacket is absolutely well made. It is thick material but light weight. But doesn't feel heavy on.  I love the pattern on this raincoat, very subtle but you can see it. I haven't worn it to see about warmth, but my guess is it will do the job. I am returning it because the size I choose was too small for me across the shoulders and chest. However, I am reordering the next size up. I debated between two sizes and went with the smaller because of reviews. However, if you are trying to decide between sizes, I would suggest you choose the larger of the two.
True to size, love how it fits, love the color

This was supposed to be my better raincoat. It's not finally got to put it to the test and it failed me completely. I was soaked all the way down to my underwear. This was not worth my money. I thought I had won the lottery when I found this in pink.
I bought this to take to Iceland and I’m very happy I did.  It’s comfortable and really does the job!
Nice and roomy for swinging a club, and with the lining, I won't be sweating inside it on a hot rainy day. Also like that the hood removes via zipper.
Nice looking jacket fit is great and she is happy!

It’s good for repelling rain, but the liner is a thin nylon and the pocket has torn after a few months. It’s not for warmth. If you want a warmth type purchase a fuzzy liner one. I botch style and this one I would not buy again. Overall, wind, rain breaker it’s ok. But liner will not hold up.
Wonderful for a trip to anyplace where you need a lightweight waterproof rain jacket

This is a perfect jacket for cool, windy fall days.  It’s lightweight, comfortable and true to size. The outer pockets are ample size and there is a large inside pocket. The only thing I don’t love is the hood. It’s very small and slips off my head.
This pink rain coat is well made and includes a hood. It has deep zipper pockets so you won’t lose your stuff. The material thickness is just right for a rainy day in the fall.

Yes, it is a waterproof jacket. But the hood is small, barely covers your head. The pockets are also comically small, my phone does not fit in it, my fisted hands can fit scrunched up. But, it’s a lightweight waterproof, and packs down small enough, which I like. Color is definitely fluorescent yellow.  Would recommend the brand baleaf, I got my son a cycling rain jacket of that brand. And its superior- hood is larger, pockets bigger, packs down smaller- and still waterproof.

评论概述: Looks to be of good quality
评论详情: Jacket appears very well made and looks waterproof.  Nicely lined in mesh, like the expensive brands.  Is 1.8 pounds in weight, which is the only reason I returned it.  Too heavy for my backpack.
I'll just say it: I look beautiful in this rain coat. It appears to be good quality. It fits well. In the end: its a good looking raincoat

I returned this jacket because it wasn't waterproof as described. It was water resistant, but in my area we get a lot of rain and I needed waterproof. The other jacket features all seemed to be good quality and it fit well, but my need of water resistance not being met caused me to return it.
After 2 washings both sides of the seams on the hood ripped apart. Very disappointing because otherwise I loved the jacket! Now on its way to goodwill, hopefully they can figure a way to fix it.
Good fit and lightweight
bought this for working outside. keeps me dry all day, but makes me super hot while working
Wish it had deeper pockets and more inside pockets. Nice lightweight rain hacket
Keeps me warm on a chilly day. I like the detachable hood too! I haven't worn it in the rain yet but it feels like it would hold up and keep me dry.

I took this jacket to Iceland and Ireland as my rain jacket. Worked well for keeping me dry. Unfortunately after 8 days of use, the outside stitching in the armpit is coming apart. I even ordered a size up so it would be loose on me. The hood on the jacket is kind of small fitting.
I should have bought a large and or gotten a longer one.  Will work well for going from the car to a building. It gets warm too.
Well-made, good fitting jacket. Heavy enough for some cooler days, too - not just.for rain

This is a nice jacket, with many nice features also seen in jackets by Columbia and Patagonia. The quality of the fabric is not comparable, and that is why it doesn't cost as much. I ordered the fluorescent orange, and the color was as pictured. It seems a bit snug for wearing under a sweater in the fall, so I sized up.
This is a very nice jacket!  I loved the color and fits nicely.  Best rain jacket I have had.

评论概述: Jacket was just what I wanted
评论详情: Nice weight & colors
Light weight with zipper. Very comfortable except the hoodie did not fit well. Other than that I loved it
Great raincoat very comfortable fits good
Pocket zipper was broken when I got the jacket.
This jacket is comfortable and keeps you dry. I live in Florida and we are in the middle of rainy season and I do not leave the house without it. The jacket fits good and keeps you warm.
This is a really cute jacket, love how the lavender color stands out on rainy days. It does run a little on the small side though, so if you’re debating between sizes, go up!

Order came next day. I was so excited for it. Jacket is heavier than I thought it would be. Seems to be well made. Feels like it may be too hot to wear in very hot weather. I wear an XL in everything very comfortably. Input this on and could not even zip it closed. Its like an XL for a child. Therefore, I could not get a good idea how it will feel actually wearing it. If I could, I may have given it another star. Needless to say it’s going right back. I’m quite disappointed. Lastly, it claims to be sackable, but there’s nothing to pick it in to. It came in a clear plastic bag. I’ll probably be trying another brand.

I wore this jacket 2 times last October then went to wear it yesterday and the zipper came apart we tried to fix it with no luck.  I had an issue with all the zippers from day 1 but thought maybe they were just stiff.  the jacket was too big so being tight was not the problem
The rain jacket fit well, but the hat wasn't the right size....I had to remove the hat and use an extra hat to cover my head.
It’s true to size
For my granddaughter on her way to college..she’s  addicted to pink

评论概述: Hood is short, front bangs exposed. Colour not as shown. It’s white on shoulder area with pink.
评论详情: Colour is not all pink as shown. Good is not full size to close at neck and bangs are exposed.
Me gustó el material y el color.Resiste lluvia y viento.El tamaño es  tal y como solicitado.

评论概述: I just recieved the item and when i checked it, it was torn in the armpit part.

评论详情: I ordered this jacket in Medium for my cruise to Alaska. The weather was between 50° and 60° F. It was the perfect amount of warmth and wind resistance. Fortunately it didn’t rain on us. But this jacket is so cute and packs up small in a suitcase.
So far it has kept me dry. Only used a few times on vacation. Like it so far

评论概述: Perfect lightweight, but warm waterproof jacket.
评论详情: Roomy , warm, waterproof, comfy, and I just love it! Loved the idea of being able to tighten the sleeves around the wrist. It was the perfect jacket for riding the sand buggies in the Oregon sand dunes.
There was nothing that I dislike about the jacket

I recently put on my lightweight jacket and discovered I'd worn holes through the pockets outside, as much as I loved the jacket, that meant I needed a replacement. Looking in stores, I had no luck. I wanted a hood and some thin lining to keep out the wind and spring rains, and sleeves that covered my shirt beneath. This had all that and it just enough to protect my hair from the rain while not looking like a baggie, with nice lined pockets to hold my phone. Very please with this.
I got this coat for rainy spring summer days and it’s perfect. Size is true to size
Fit like a man’s
Unless you have a toddler size head and an adult size body, this is not the jacket for you. The jacket itself is nice, if you have no intention of using the hood.
Loved it

Bought this for our trip to Iceland and it was well used.  It was well made with quality material and provided stellar protection from wind and rain.  I still had to layer up but this kept me dry and protected from the strong winds
This is a very well-made jacket. It is comfortable and warm for spring but not too warm.  Very nice!
I haven't used it yet but I'm impressed by the workmanship & quality of the jacket so worth the money
There was no bag with it

I searched on Amazon so long for a good rain jacket. Decided on this one based on reviews and I’m glad I did. Good material. I don’t get wet. Only issue the hood slides off with mvmt for me if my hair isn’t flat. Maybe it’s because I have a big head lol
I really liked this jacket and it seemed absolutely perfect until I put up the hood. The hood is teeny tiny and completely unusable. As a result, I had to return it.
The material is very nice and lightweight but not Cincy. It looks nice on and is waterproof.
Fit according to size, light weight & comfy.

评论概述: Works great, but the hood is unnaturally small
评论详情: The jacket is great in all respects, except for the hood, which neither stays on my head, nor covers more than half of my head.  I just wear a rain hat with it, and all is good.
This coat served me well for late spring travel. I noticed how nice it looked in my pictures. It kept me dry and cute!
The jacket size is made a little smaller. Nice waterproof, material and breathable.
Gets wet inside. Not only does not absorb moisture it condenses it.
Lightweight and breathable. Love the powder blue color. Adjustable wrist tabs and extra pocket a plus too!
Nice jacket.  Hood is too small to cover from the rain.  Pockets are too small.

This jacket is very lightweight and comfortable. My only issue is with the hood. It’s a little big and blocks my view when I use it. It’s not meant to keep you warm. Waterproof is good and zipper works great.

I love that this coat is lightweight, but also keeps me dry in the rain, but's breathable.  It's very comfortable to wear, add great on a windy day as well. This is the best weather (fall) coat I've ever owned! I highly recommend!

评论概述: Beautiful jacket but ripped the second time I wore it in the pocket!
评论详情: I love the color and it was a great windbreaker. However the pocket tore wide open after only wearing it twice. The zippers aren’t great either. Seems like they want to catch.

评论概述: A MUST HAVE! AMAZING PINK COMFY RAIN JACKET
评论详情: I love this rain jacket, it's so cute and comfy. It keeps me dry and fashionable!! I loved it so much I bought it for my best friend so we could match :)

The hood is a joke! It barely covers 1/3 of the head. The sleeves are also oddly short. Someone has their measurements all wrong. It was bought for a vacation and unfortunately my daughter had to go without one, because of the poor fit. It was returned instead.
Bought for my daughter, it’s light weight & waterproof, she loves it.
It’s easy to take off and on very light for a rain jacket

great coat I love the styling and comfort of this coat light weight. I could have ordered a size larger for more room in the stomach area but it still is not to tight. Have had many compliments on this coat.

评论概述: Está hermosa igual que la foto se las recomiendo 💖
评论详情: Es súper liviana cómoda y abriga mucho 😍
The hood is so tiny that it’s funny. And the yellow is way more neon than I thought. The fit was great, but I’ll still be returning it.

评论概述: Great jacket, especially for the price
评论详情: this is the third jacket of this brand we have bought in our family. Almost everyone has one now! Even the teenager likes it!

this rain jacket runs very large, amazon recommended a Large and i was swimming in it and the sleeves were long enough for a tall man (im not lol). its a slightly heaver than thin rain jacket so would be great for 50-60 degree chilly rainy weather. the hood is also on the smaller side so i didnt think it would protect all my hair or glasses either. returned

I was really skeptical about  buying this jacket I’m glad that I did it’s perfect and pretty I got the pink rose and it’s true to color I got an XL so I can layer it has some weight to it and it’s warm great quality I love everything about it I will purchase another color 🙂
Well constructed, accurate sizing, good value.

The side pockets are hard to zip as it seems the flap is backwards. It's hard to put things into... and the pockets are to small. My arms would be hot and sweaty as there's no wicking material.  But overall it's a good raincoat so far.

评论概述: Yes I love the jacket and the color especially
评论详情: The color especially

Nice length, below waist just above mid hip. Velcro adjust on wrists. Velcro close hood at neck. Tad snug fit. Im busty. Sweater would make it tight. Amazon suggested L, bought L, could go XL. Might buy another later. Portland OR rain so far 7 mo. This is med thickness, not flimsy, has light mesh inside for barrier to jacket. Well made. 👍 Good buy.
Love this Jacket !!!!!
PERFECT FIT AND ALL-AROUND DESIGN.
Worked great in the rain!

First off I am a man but it seems like womens Jackets always fit better. In this case it was spot on. I ordered the XL  and at 5'5" and 155#s the fit is just barely oversize. I plan on taking it backpacking and wearing it on the plane. I have a packable down to wear under it if need be. I hate when the hoods are so large they fall in your eyes. This hood does not. The jacket seems to be made ok for the price. The only flaw is it does not have a rain flap for the zipper so rain will absolutely get in there. If it does rain I will have a poncho over everything so for my purpose it is not an issue. It just seems kind of regretful to not install a rain flap on a rain coat zipper.05/20/24 UPDATE:  There are not vents anywhere on the jacket. The result being it becomes hot very quickly when worn even in cool weather. No one could possibly use it for a running jacket or any physically demanding actions. Just walking in 50 degree weather causes a sauna like atmosphere inside the coat. It seems to be waterproof but with no ventilation it causes sweating quite quickly.
This jacket is just what I've been looking for. Something I can wear in cold or warm weather. I will definitely be ordering another one.
I really like this rain coat, it fits well, the blue color is just like the picture. Length is just perfect.

Ordered two different sizes. One what I  normally wear and the other a larger size. They fit snuggly and I wanted more room so returned both. The quality looked good but just didn't fit . I'd definitely size up a couple of sizes if you buy.
Was exactly what I expected. I'm a 2xl in non stretch shirts and  the 2xl fit perfect. This rain jacket was just like the description. Would order again.
You can just tell when you pick it up that this jacket is of good quality. It’s not cheap or flimsy, but feels well made. It’s cute for a rain coat too!
I needed a new rain jacket and this was the perfect one for all the rain we had.
Keeps me warm. The zipper is a little stiff but will probably break in after use. Love this jacket.

This is exactly what I was looking for. Not too thin but light. I ordered a large in case I would need to wear a sweater underneath. This rain jacket is made very well, good quality material, does what says in the product description.

I’m loving this jacket! It’s very cute, looks good on and a perfect Spring jacket that doubles as a rain jacket too. I got the hot pink color which is a color that will look good on anyone. Actually the style is going to be universally flattering. Fits true to size.

I wear size either small or in coats medium, but I ordered large in this coat hoping for an easy fit.  Instead, the top was very roomy but hip area was impossibly tight.  I had selected this coat because of the zipper pockets but I had to return it.  Too bad, because raincoats with zipper pockets are hard to find!
Me encantó el color y la calidad , resistente al agua

Fits great and doesn't have that annoying rustling sound when you move. Only disappointment was the color. Dark Grey has a green tint to it. It is NOT a true grey. If I didn't need it for a trip I would have returned it.
I love the look, feel, and durability of this jacket. That is, EXCEPT for the pockets. They are too small and got holes in them after only a few wears.

I have looked in many stores for the right rain coat.  I didn’t want anything thin but didn’t want it like a winter coat either. I wanted it to keep me dry, but also warm if it’s super windy. This jacket is perfect. It has a lining in the arms, a mesh liner in the body area, inside pocket, chest pocket, not a bulky hood, long enough to cover most of my butt, adjustable cuff, and it’s purple ( my favorite color).  I love the design on the fabric.  It came just in time on a rainy day. Kept me very dry.  I wasn’t hot in the car and it’s not real stiff feeling.  The zipper is strong and the outside pockets have zippers too.  I normally wear a XL but bought a 2x in case I have a sweater or sweatshirt on. Perfect fit and not too bulky big.  I have worn it on non rainy days.  Love this jacket and would highly recommend it.  I’ll probably get another one in a different color.
Love the velcro on cuffs. Hood is nice fit to keep rain out, deep pockets. Just love it!
Very well made, fits great and looks good.
